org.numenta.nupic.model

Class Synapse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.model.Synapse

  • public class Synapse
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a connection with varying strength which when above a configured threshold represents a valid connection. This class may hold state because its scope is limited to a given Thread's Connections object.
    Author:
    Chetan Surpur, David Ray
    See Also:
    Segment, TemporalMemory.Connections

        public Synapse(Connections c,
       Cell sourceCell,
       Segment segment,
       double permanence,
       int index)
        Constructs a new Synapse
        Parameters:
        c - the connections state of the temporal memory
        sourceCell - the Cell which will activate this Synapse
        segment - the owning dendritic segment
        permanence - this Synapse's permanence
        index - this Synapse's index
